trans-unit.source: Imagine that you have to deploy something in php. You don’t have a choice. You HAVE to.
trans-unit.target: Imagine that you have to deploy something in php. You don’t have a choice. You HAVE to.

trans-unit.source: Other python modules that can accomplish the general idea:
trans-unit.target: 一般的な考えを達成できる他のpythonモジュール。

trans-unit.source: The main benefit of using the var_dump method, is that there is no overhead in loading/unloading/parsing/etc.
trans-unit.target: var_dump メソッドを使う主な利点は、ロード/アンロード/パースなどのオーバーヘッドがないことです。

trans-unit.source: Then just include that file in your php programs.
trans-unit.target: そして、そのファイルをあなたのphpプログラムにインクルードします。

trans-unit.source: There’s also a php_as_block function, which does the trivial encapsulation as above.
trans-unit.target: There’s also a php_as_block function, which does the trivial encapsulation as above.

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to build a php include file that simply runs fast, and that can use multiple includes within the filesystem as a “database” like system. This way you don’t have to set up any databases, libraries, or whatever - you can just deploy PHP code without coding much in PHP.
trans-unit.target: This method allows you to build a php include file that simply runs fast, and that can use multiple includes within the filesystem as a “database” like system. This way you don’t have to set up any databases, libraries, or whatever - you can just deploy PHP code without coding much in PHP.

trans-unit.source: Why on earth would you want this?!?!?
trans-unit.target: 一体何でこんなのが欲しいんだ!?

trans-unit.source: You’d probable then want to save it…
trans-unit.target: You’d probable then want to save it…

trans-unit.source: a port of the var_dump function of php to python.
trans-unit.target: php の var_dump 関数を python に移植しました。
phpの関数をpythonに変換します。

trans-unit.source: implements the PHP serialize/unserialize functions in python allows you to serialize a python data structure to PHP allows you to unserialize a php data structure to Python
trans-unit.target: pythonでPHPのシリアライズ/アンシリアライズ関数を実装しています pythonのデータ構造をPHPにシリアライズすることができます PHPのデータ構造をPythonにアンシリアライズすることができます

trans-unit.source: php_var_dump lets you do all your data processing and management in python. You can then convert your native python data structures into php code, which can then be saved as include fles for php.
trans-unit.target: php_var_dump を使用すると、すべてのデータ処理と管理を python で行うことができます。ネイティブの python データ構造を php コードに変換し、php 用のインクルードファイルとして保存することができます。

trans-unit.source: there are json parsers in php, which can read code you save
trans-unit.target: phpにはjsonパーサーがあり、保存したコードを読み取ることができます。
